job_details.Functieomschrijving:
Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation., The Next Chapter W&S
   Gemeente:
   The Hague
   Contracttype:
   Vast contract, Voltijds
   Categorieën:
   Software Engineer, Back-End Developer
   Opleidingsniveau:
   Bachelor
   Master
   Gepubliceerd:
   24.11.2023
   Deel nu:
   Vind een job die bij jou past
job_details.full_text:
Backend (Cloud) Software Engineer

Our client is looking for an exceptional Backend Software Engineer with a strong background in developing high-performance, scalable software solutions tailored for Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments and distributed systems. In this role, you will play a pivotal part in designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform that caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications.

   You will work on a range of cloud technologies such as streaming APIs, network protocols, and security best practices throughout the software stack.

   Job specifics:
     * Implement robust backend systems using the selected infrastructure frameworks and open-source.
     * Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems.
     * Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation., The Next Chapter W&S
   Gemeente:
   The Hague
   Contracttype:
   Vast contract, Voltijds
   Categorieën:
   Software Engineer, Back-End Developer
   Opleidingsniveau:
   Bachelor
   Master
   Gepubliceerd:
   24.11.2023
   Deel nu:
   Vind een job die bij jou past

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on backend software engineering, cloud-native development, and distributed systems within a Kubernetes environment. While it mentions catering to 'modern LLM mission-critical applications' and working with 'streaming APIs', it lacks specific details about developing, fine-tuning, or deploying generative models themselves. The core responsibilities and technologies described align more with traditional backend development and cloud infrastructure rather than specialized GenAI engineering tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or PEFT. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category as it's not a clear technical AI role as defined in the Coding Book, but rather a traditional software engineering role that *supports* AI applications.

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'developing high-performance, scalable software solutions', 'designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform', 'Implement robust backend systems', and 'seamless integration with backend systems', which are core software development activities.
The role involves building and integrating systems, which is a fundamental aspect of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: designing and constructing an innovative, real-time cloud platform

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implement robust backend systems' directly refers to the creation of backend software.
Collaboration with DevOps and front-end teams for integration is a common software development practice.
job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams to ensure seamless integration with backend systems

job_tasks.justification: Ensuring test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation are standard software development practices for quality and maintainability.
job_tasks.phrase: Drive comprehensive test coverage, instrumentation, and documentation.

job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Kubernetes-based, cloud-native environments' and 'distributed systems' points towards operational aspects of deploying and managing software in the cloud.
Working with 'cloud technologies' and 'distributed systems' implies managing and operating systems in a cloud environment.
The description states the platform 'caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications', indicating an understanding of the business context and application domain.
job_tasks.phrase: caters most modern LLM (Large Language Model) mission-critical applications

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate closely with DevOps and front-end teams
